storyInfo: A vehicle from the Truckers' Union is what caused the fire, for which Eirene is arrested and put on trial. However, Alberto and Venezia Junior tacitly plead her innocence. Lappland and Texas reunite, witnessing both the port blaze and the entire court hearing.

attributes.content: Buongiorno, dear residents.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: After several months of preparation, Carnevale will be held as scheduled on the evening of November 9th, where hundreds of thousands of citizens will be on the streets celebrating the one-year anniversary of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: According to the Carnevale organizing committee, all the beast floats have been assembled at the port, and will be moved to the expansion plate today in preparation for the night parade.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The street theater competition has also concluded. The most popular team will gain the privilege of illuminating the floats on the behalf of every citizen here on Carnevale night...
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Other shortlisted plays will also be performed on both sides of the parade path alongside the floats.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The committee hopes that everyone will cooperate and maintain the floats' mystery before their forms are unveiled on Carnevale night! Please rein in your curiosity, and do not sneak a look, photograph or spread any float-related information!
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: In other news: On November 5th, a traffic accident occurred on Quinta Strada in the port district late at night with one injury reported. The vehicle responsible escaped after crashing.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The police quickly got the scene under control, and restored order in the area. The incident did not have any serious consequences, so there is no need for our dear citizens to worry.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Presently, the police have established a special task force to investigate and identify the vehicle responsible, and the case should be closed within the next few days. Citizens who discover any relevant clues should contact the police as soon as possible...
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Texas.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're back.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Just a brief visit, I'll go back to court later.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: How's Leon?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The doctor came here three times... only for routine check-ups though—at least his condition isn't getting worse, I suppose?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm guessing you had trouble dealing with that case yesterday?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The case was closed... in a way I didn't want, with a way I was powerless to stop.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Texas, I don't recall you having a habit of tuning into the afternoon news.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The situation isn't as optimistic as the news make it out to be, right?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We found some clues and locked onto some suspects, but we haven't made any other progress.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Who called the police that night?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The info we got was all fake. Hard to investigate.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Maybe I could help? I know quite a few people in the city, those from the famiglia...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Grazie, Texas... I know you've been keeping an eye on the whole thing.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your mere presence in Volsinii was enough to strike a nerve in every influence in the city. Some were angry, while others got a wake-up call, and we managed to turn things around.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But a year has passed, and we're in Nuova Volsinii now. In a new city without the famiglie, the 'Last Texas' can't really do much.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In other words, the 'Last Texas' shouldn't be allowed to do much here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signorina Texas, there's a phone call at reception for you.
attributes.name: Nurse

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Who is this?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha. Need a ride, Texas?
I won't wait too long.
The sun was so strong the last two days. What's with the sudden heavy downpour?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You wouldn't be carrying an umbrella if you were really surprised.
Here, over here.
On the hood of a cab, and under a huge black umbrella, the driver casually plays with the car keys in her hand.
Haha, you got here quickly.
Da quanto tempo, Texas.
The driver slowly lifts her umbrella, revealing a sharp crescent—an unrestrained smile. She then nonchalantly tosses the umbrella aside and salutes a greeting to Texas.
Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The weather got me thinking about our old home. The nights and rain in Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Yeah. The weather here has always been great until today.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But you seem to have saw this rain coming, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I just prepare for the worst. We're still in Siracusa after all. Having just one rainy day after so many days of fine weather is pretty rare.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What exactly happened with that accident?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You mean the one with the Bellone wolf pup? Hahahaha. Surely you're not suspecting that I did it with my car right here?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I wouldn't be surprised if it was you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You wouldn't be here right now if you had nothing to do with it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...I do know a few things.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Willing to have a ride with me?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hmph. Why not? I wouldn't be standing here otherwise.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You know, I thought you'd be nice and shade me from the rain with your umbrella.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You seem like you're enjoying the rain. Didn't want to spoil your fun.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's the Texas I know.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you going to just stay on your car like that? In such a big rain with no spectators? Not tired?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh? Haven't you been watching me the whole time?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Get in the car, Texas. Our destination is quite far away, so it'll be quite a long drive.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Right, I prepared a gift for you in the passenger seat.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I saw the snacks... I don't have the appetite right now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's alright, it's not millefoglie this time.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I've long changed my tastes.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Though I know you're still obsessed with those old habits of yours.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas? Back so soon?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...Demetri?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You shouldn't have clearance to come in here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: There's always a way. You can't prevent me from seeing Leon forever.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I brought some flowers. Hmm, is there a vase in here that might fit?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We used to have roses like this at the Bellone residence, remember?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The police have thoroughly investigated my travel itinerary on your orders for the past two days, every single detail.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But they found no clues linking me to that accident.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm not so stupid to think you'd commit a crime yourself.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: My city hall colleagues told me how they recently received an entity ownership change application from Saluzzo Vino... Why are you collaborating with Alberto, Demetri?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Since this city—or I should say, you—have been so unwelcome, I had to figure out my own way to stay here.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Doesn't it comply with the city rules?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...Perfectly.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then, wouldn't it be better if I stayed within your sights?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You've already deployed enough officers here to watch every step I take, any contact I make, every order I give.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I should be allowed a visit.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I was the one nursing Leon back to health whenever he was sick.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Bellones won't give up trying to enter the city, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But in any case, there is no need or reason for me to hurt Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'll accept your flowers in his place.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I'm sorry. As an officer of the law, I will not allow a potential suspect to meet the victim in private.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon's safety is closely tied to the city's.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No one can say where the chaos will come from next.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: —This is what you wanted me to see?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I see the rain earlier wasn't heavy enough.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Fire.
The speeding cab suddenly brakes when it nears the fire, leaving clear skid marks on the still-wet ground.
Would you believe me if I said I brought you here to extinguish the fire?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The monstrous wolf breathes flames and thick smoke into the air.
The giant beast-shaped float burns, the bright fire light standing out against the dull dark sky.
Lappland... how much do you know about this?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Suspecting me?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No. You would have chosen a more classical and conspicuous method.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You'd be standing in the fire right now at least, not next to me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, you know me so well.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Too bad the workers and police are pretty quick to act. I think the fire'll be put out quite soon.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: They should be thanking that burst of heavy rain earlier, otherwise the fire might have already burned down Nuova Volsinii Port to cinders.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No matter how big the fire is, it doesn't change the fact that it's here in the city.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Leontuzzo and the others wanted to give the new city a brand new festival to help build a collective identity.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: A car accident that left the Mayor in critical condition and a giant blaze breaking out at the logistics port just before Carnevale. That's enough to keep the civilians up awake at night.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Doesn't it feel like some kind of omen, a proclamation, or even a provocation?!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: How much do you actually know, Lappland? What's your objective?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. You sound anxious—Why?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Wasn't Nuova Volsinii the proving grounds Signora Sicilia promised to the youths?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: An experiment is bound to produce mixed results.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: As the first witness on the scene, I can tell you for certain the Bellone pup's car crash was purely an accident.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You've been watching over him at the hospital, and his condition has already stabilized, right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So what's causing your anxiety?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I look forward to your answer, Texas... at Carnevale.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No matter what you're planning...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll be keeping an eye on you for Lavinia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hahaha, then sit tight.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I have no interest in wasting my time with those officers.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: H-How can that be?!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The parade float... got lit up on fire along with the goods—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Ugh—?!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Calm down, it's me. The police are on their way here, so stay out of their sight.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: L-Lyudmila?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Where did you go the night before yesterday? No, wait. Why are you here?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I have more questions than you, Sommer.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Where did you go after the accident?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I-I went to find Eirene. She knocked me out cold and then locked me inside the warehouse—Well, a lot happened, and it was a hell of an escape.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: *sigh* Come with me. Everyone's attention is focused on the float now. My smoke will cover our tracks, and no one'll spot us.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Why's there a burn spot on your jacket?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The fire... was y-your...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: My doing.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The police would have discovered the truck and its contents if I hadn't done it there and then. It was the only way.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Enough, we'll talk when we're safe. Those officers—
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: W-Wait, Lyudmila. Someone just went by over there... Eirene?!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Who's the guy next to her?!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Eirene Lavazza, and Alberto Saluzzo. Could you both please kindly explain what brings you here just two hundred meters away from the fire?
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I don't see a need to explain myself.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: If you want my answer, have the judge bring the evidence and arrest warrant to me first.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I'll be waiting.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: We'll get to it, Signor Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: It's true we don't have any evidence to pin you as the culprit, but this doesn't mean you're completely unrelated to the case.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: As for you, Signorina Eirene Lavazza.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The float burned nearly to nothing, but we managed to collect some fragments.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: We'll send them for analysis later, but we're basically certain that the vehicle used for the float was a truck from your group.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: As the head of the Truckers' Union, you'll have to come with us for our investigation.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: ...Signor Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Signorina Lavazza, our previous agreement still stands.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I believe you have no link to the matter, but do be careful about what you say once you leave this place.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Otherwise, even I won't be able to help you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Don't you find this place familiar, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But this time, the one standing in the defendant's dock is neither you or me...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What a shame.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Even if we take the judge's word that this case is suspected of endangering the city's public safety, there's no reason to let all of these people in here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: A trial for a truck driver, and the audience gallery seats are filled with made men from two famiglie with conflicting interests.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hahaha. I'm liking Nuova Volsinii more and more, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But I have to say, this trial was put together more quickly than I thought.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Probably a special procedure. Carnevale is tomorrow, so it's understandable they'd want to settle the case ASAP.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you know this Eirene woman?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You don't have to probe me, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I only met this poor little driver once, but I can guess how she ended up here.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You mean, she's innocent?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I didn't say that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Isn't this scene a regular occurrence in the swamp of Siracusa?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It swallows everyone up eventually. Not everyone can escape it like you did...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Either you get killed and silenced, or you hide within the mud and drag out a meaningless existence.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas, do you believe that Nuova Volsinii offers a third way of life?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Silence.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: In accordance with the New Urban Management Act, the Nuova Volsinii criminal court will commence with the Nuova Volsinii Port Arson Public Prosecution Case, number 00278. Court is in session.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Defendant, please state your identity for the record.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Eirene Lavazza. Born in Sicilia, currently a member of the Truckers' Union and living in the Trucker Camp on Viale Alito, Zona Torino.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What did they mean our testimony would be invalid in court?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Does that mean we can only sit here and wait for the results of her trial?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I wanted to go even more than you do, Lyudmila. After all, it's because of me that Eirene...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: But you heard about what happened at the police station, right? She didn't say anything... so we can't just barge in there ourselves.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: She believes in the government and the courts, and thinks she can prove her innocence...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Do you believe that'll happen?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I believe in her.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Wait for me here, Sommer. I'll call the other guys to go with us. We should be standing by her side right now no matter what.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Sommer slumps over on the ground cradling his head, watching Lyudmila leave.

If he hadn't helped the Venezias transport their goods without telling Eirene, if that car accident hadn't happened, if he hadn't asked Eirene for help, if he had managed to break free from his chains earlier and make it to the port in time...
He's the reason why this incident happened, but now the one standing in court awaiting trial is his best friend, and his... daughter.
He gropes around in a pocket for a business card. He doesn't know who stuck it in the gaps of his campervan door.
The card only has an address on it—'Terza Zona Porto'.
Eirene, I know you outsmart me in most cases...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: But this time, I know I can help you out for sure...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: He stands up and leaves the campground alone.
Eirene Lavazza. Identity matches registered information.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: The blaze at Zona Porto yesterday caused serious property damage, put the lives of dozens of workers at the port at risk, and gravely threatened the public safety of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Carnevale is right around the corner, and this incident will immeasurably affect public opinion.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: The court has examined the evidence submitted by the police, and found that the great wolf parade float, the source of the fire, has obvious traces of arson.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: The vehicle was from the Truckers' Union. The police reviewed the trucks' shift schedules and found out it was not deployed at that time, and should not have been in Porto Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: You, head of the Truckers' Union, also just happened to be at the scene of the crime—
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Signorina Lavazza, you are our prime suspect. You have every right to defend yourself.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Your Honor, I'm happy to tell you everything I know.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene calmly explains how yesterday's fire had no links to any one from the Truckers' Union.
But the judge's expression becomes even gloomier.
The judge can't help her, even if he wants to.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course. As long as the real culprit doesn't show up, her attempt to defend herself will be for naught.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: *sigh* Woe, the poor lady! Don't you want to help her out, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You could stand up and vouch for her, etcetera. The court might be lenient on her if it's you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking, Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii's laws absolutely cannot be trampled upon or scorned like that. They strove to make these rules a reality.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then I fear you can only sit back and watch everything unfold, or...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland sends Texas a provocative look, eager to try something.
I could care less for your boring rules. Want me to help you out?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: *ahem* Please hold on. The court has just received a supplementary list of new witnesses who would like to provide testimony.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Uh... A-Alberto Saluzzo?
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: What's wrong, Your Honor? As a legal citizen who has completed his identity registration in total compliance with the New Urban Management Act, surely my testimony will be valid in court?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: O-Of course. Please proceed to state your testimony for the record.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Signor Saluzzo, are you intending to provide evidence to the court to prove that Eirene was indeed related to the fire?
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Alberto does not answer. His gaze falls on the opposite site of the witness box. Venezia Junior and the other Venezias are sitting on the left side of the audience.
Alberto's eyes turn to the seat behind Venezia Junior—there sits his own daughter, the banished Saluzzo.
She crosses her legs, grins, and waves to him as if no one else is in the room.
Next to her is Texas.
(Ciao.)
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas, my dear father is watching us. Stop being so reserved and wave along.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Signore? Signor Saluzzo? Please continue with your testimony.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I was there as well, and I can attest that Signorina Lavazza did not start the fire.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Terza Zona... should be here...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Sommer?
The boss made us wait here for you.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Come. He wants to see you.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Are you from the Venezias? Or the Saluzzos? Or the Medicis...?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: This'll help Eirene, right?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Right up ahead.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The container in that corner. Just open the door and go in.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.text: Eirene. I'm sorry for not telling you, but I already made arrangements for Guri.
You know how I kept asking for more shifts and saved quite a bit of cash. It should at least be enough to pay for two years of Oripathy treatment and her school fees.
The school isn't too far from our camp, so it'll be easier to look after her this way too.

I did take you in at the start, but compared with all the help you've given us all these years it's hard to say who has helped the other more. Eirene, it's not fair they've got a spotlight on you now.
It's time you think about yourself too, haha.
I wanna say I've never been much of an idealist. After all, I've seen enough in this life, I know very well what I can do or can't...
I'm just a tiny supermarket owner and driver who hopes we can all live a peaceful life... this is also why I was willing to follow you here.

The shop's no more, but we can always move to a new place and figure out a new way of life. There's no need to waste our time on those guys who ruined our lives. Everyone gets their share of bad luck, so there's no need to blame anyone.
We just have to stay far away from the troubles.
Fortunately, you helped us all find a good spot.
I bet Guri will like it here.

attributes.content: I guarantee you my testimony is absolutely true. As I said earlier, she was with me the whole time from yesterday before noon until the fire happened at the port.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Two Saluzzo Vino vineyards will soon welcome our first harvest. I hope the Truckers' Union will allocate a fleet to help transport our fresh grapes.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: This is why we were at the port to check things out. My employees can vouch for us as well.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: (Sounds of agreement)
attributes.name: Gallery Mafiosi

attributes.content: In other words, Signorina Lavazza has a strong alibi.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: (Claps) Magnifico.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: My astute padre has tied the Truckers' Union to the Saluzzos.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That poor driver will have to do his bidding in future.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't think it'll end just like that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The truck came from your union. We checked the shipping schedule and it wasn't slated with any arrangements for the last two days. So why did it show up at the port and become one of the floats?
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Signorina Lavazza, even if you truly did not start the fire, as the head of your union it is your responsibility to explain the illegal usage of this car.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: I can testify for Signorina Lavazza on that point.
Signor Venezia?
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Your Honor, please take a look at the customs declaration form in the supplementary evidence you received earlier. The truck was transporting tires for Venezia Trucking.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: This is it. Go in.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: He's waiting.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The shipping container door lies ajar, and all Sommer can see is a faint light flickering inside the dark interior.
So, who on Terra is helping me... and Eirene?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Enough questions, vecchio.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Go in and you'll find out at once.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You want to help that driver, and so do we. That's all you need to know.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Sommer puts his hand on the door, and hesitates.
Can you guarantee—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: There is no one available to answer him. The mafiosi already left, leaving him on his own.

attributes.text: Eirene, I don't have brains or guts like yours.
Which is why I was so surprised but also worried when you promised Judge Lavinia and Mayor Leontuzzo you'd be the head of the union.
It meant we were going to get into tons of trouble... and sure enough we did.
But back then you told me what we were starting wasn't actually a 'union' to help city hall handle the famiglie, but an 'association' to provide mutual aid to anyone in a similar situation as us.
You always say I was the one who took you in, but we all know it was you who gave me another chance at life.
I'm not saying we're even now, I owe you so much.
Eirene, if a day comes where I can help you out, I won't hesitate at all.
I don't want Guri to think her papa as an ungrateful person.
I tried to be a good role model for her.

attributes.content: Signor Venezia, I'm sure you're clear what your statement means, right?
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Signor Saluzzo claims he submitted testimony out of his responsibility as a citizen, but this incident actually involves Venezia Trucking.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The demand for our vehicles here has spiked in the last two months because of Carnevale, and we had to order an impromptu shipment of automotive consumables from the other cities.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: This newly-arrived batch of goods has already cleared custom, and the Truckers' Union was helping us do a last-mile delivery. It was an impromptu request, which is why they haven't updated this job to their schedule.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Signorina Lavazza, do correct me if I got anything wrong.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You're right, we do have the paper trail, if needed.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: As for why that truck was found at the port amongst the parade floats, we don't know who did it yet, so I implore the police to continue their investigation.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Though at least, the Truckers' Union did not use their truck illegally, and Signorina Lavazza was merely a bit negligent in this whole affair.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: We'll verify the information.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Oh, the poor driver's pretty lucky. We're so close to the end of the tunnel.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The pivotal testimonies from my father and Venezia Junior are enough to clear Eirene of suspicion. Nothing will happen to her.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But the suspect has now become an outsider.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Eirene's the actual person involved, but she can't even get a word in. The courtroom's turned into an exclusive stage for the Venezias and Saluzzos.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: These two factions are clearly fighting under the table, but they seem to have a tacit understanding once they're in court.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Everyone knows that's how the mafia works.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: They want to claim complete innocence, and seize the Truckers' Union for themselves at the same time.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course. After all, we haven't found the actual person who started the fire.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Unless... they'll never find the person ever again.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hahaha, the famiglie never consider what the persons involved are willing to offer when they want something in return.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...I have to contact Lavinia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He takes in two deep breaths, pushes the shipping container door open, and goes in.
...Nobody's here?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Inside is a sole lamp and chair with no one else.
Sommer is stunned.
He decides to wait. As long as he can help Eirene this way...
He's willing to wait.

attributes.text: Eirene, I like this new city.
I hope Guri likes it too. At the very least, I've prepared a better environment for her here.
Grazie, Eirene.
Look, I better get going. I've never gotten a late delivery on my record.

attributes.content: Terza Zona... He should be here...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Blyat! How am I supposed to find him in such a huge place?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Lyudmila anxiously pops in and out of alleys created by the containers, trying to locate any trace of Sommer.
Until she hears voices nearby.
So? Where are you going on vacation after Carnevale?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Volsinii? The old-school musical theaters are all there. I'm planning to go to the more sophisticated establishments.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: I rather go to Terni. I hear the clubs there have male Perro striptease dancers from Bolívar.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Tsk. You better tuck your tail in if you do, Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Hah. Want me to recommend you some ticket vendors in Volsinii?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: You're a pretty good guy, and get work done quick. If you can't get along with the Venezias, come find me and I'll introduce you to some guys.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: I'll pass. Want a smoke?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Heh, this lighter's pretty easy to use.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Lyudmila sees the two yapping openly, but she could not care any less what they are talking about.
Her sole target is the golden lighter one of them is playing with in his hand.
She recognizes that lighter, and knows the two are not its owners. It belongs to a driver who doesn't smoke.
What Lyudmila doesn't know is that it originally belonged to a famiglia associate.
After a roller-coaster ride, it ends up back in the hands of the mob once more.
